text: The inaugural ceremony of the Colombo International Tea Convention was held at the BMICH and the Convention will be held from the 9th to the 11th of August, at the Cinnamon Grand Colombo.Over 200 foreign tea entrepreneurs are in the country to participate in this Convention.The representatives of the Colombo International Tea Convention 2017 and the tea planters joined with President Maithripala Sirisena at a tea party held at the Presidents House in Colombo, on 9th August. title: Representatives of Colombo International Tea Convention meet President
